Kill Bloodstained Webmages fast and interrupt [‍Silken Restraints].
Use defensive while you're affected by [‍Cultivated Poisons] since this is the main damaging ability of the fight.
When you're affected by [‍Grasping Blood] you can use any form of crowd control instead of killing it to cancel your root.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
[‍Resonant Barrage] from Trilling Attendant.
[‍Horrifying Shrill] from Ixin.
[‍Revolting Volley] from Bloodstained Webmage.
[‍Venom Volley] from Blood Overseer.
Pay extra attention to these casts:
[‍Alarm Shrill] from Sentry Stagshell
A really long cast that needs to get disrupted.
[‍Massive Slam] from Nerubian Hauler and Hulking Bloodguard
A short stun that ramps in damage done per cast.
A really long cast that needs to get disrupted.
A short stun that ramps in damage done per cast.
Use your defensives during [‍Vociferous Indoctrination].

Always keep an eye on your tanks positioning and follow him. Otherwise it is very easy to get gripped with [‍Chains of Oppression] through the pool that is left from [‍Vociferous Indoctrination], which very dangerous.
Watch out for [‍Knife Throw]. Use defensives if you're targeted by this ability.
Make sure to position yourself close to the boss to maximise cleave uptime since ‍[‍Shadow Shunpo] targets a random player.
Use your defensives for [‍Dark Pulse]. This happens at 100 boss energy.
Save big defensives such as ‍[‍Greater Invisibility] and ‍[‍Ice Cold] to stand in puddles in order to save encounter space when soaking orbs.

[‍Shifting Anomalies] moves onto player's location. Thus it is recommended to move together as a group throughout the whole fight to dodge the mechanic easier as it's going to be much more predictable. As a bonus it is also going to be easier to deal with ‍[‍Umbral Weave] this way.
Use your defensives for [‍Splice] since it's the highest damage event during this fight.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
[‍Web Bolt] from Sureki Silkbinder.
[‍Grimweave Blast] from Covert Webmancer.
[‍Mending Web] from Covert Webmancer.
[‍Twist Thoughts] from Herald of Anurek.
[‍Void Wave] from Sureki Unnaturaler.
Always stack up to spawn [‍Volatile Spikes] close together to ensure you can detonate them all with 1 [‍Refracting Beam].
Use defensives for [‍Earth Shatterer].
Use your defensive before [‍Unstable Crash] happens or while you have multiple stacks of  [‍Unstable Energy].
Generally crystal shards die to passive cleave but swap to them if they are not dying.
Mage
Mage
Use your defensives on [‍Entropic Reckoning].

Make sure to utilize ‍[‍Shimmer] and place ‍[‍Entropy] away from the group. Following this logic, the farthest ‍Void Rift should be consumed by you first so the group members with less mobility can reach the closer ones.

‍Unbridled Void is a cone so it becomes wider the further away you are. Keep that in mind and try to position yourself closer to the boss when possible to make it easier to dodge for yourself or be ready to close the distance with your mobility.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
[‍Howling Fear] from Ghastly Voidsoul.
[‍Censoring Gear] from Turned Speaker.
[‍Piercing Wail] from Void Bound Howler.
[‍Restoring Metals] from Forgebound Mender and Cursedforge Mender.
[‍Arcing Void] from Cursedheart Invader.
Do not try to ‍[‍Shimmer] over [‍Obsidian Beam]. It still applies the dot to you which deals a ton of damage.
Consider using a defensive if you're affected by [‍Collapsing Night]. Getting out of this quickly is important since it deals a lot of damage every 0.5 seconds.
Be careful while using [‍Shimmer] on the ship as it bugs out half of the time there.
Be ready to shoot [‍Dark Orb] into a desirable path.
Use defensives for the [‍Dark Orb] and [‍Shadowy Decay].
Frost Mage
Frost Mage
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
[‍Night Bolt] from Nightfall Shadowmage.
[‍Ensnaring Shadows] from Nightfall Shadowmage.
[‍Tormenting Beam] from Nightfall Darkcaster.
[‍Umbral Barrier] from Nightfall Darkcaster.
Interrupt [‍Spirit Bolt] every time a non-tank player is targeted.
Try to avoid ‍[‍Tears of the Forest] pools behind or around you whenever ‍[‍Repulsive Visage] is about to happen as it may fear you right into them.
Try to line up your cooldowns with Droman Oulfarran's [‍Droman's Wrath] to gain a huge DPS boost. This happens when Droman Oulfarran reaches 20% health.
Help CC the Illusionary Vulpins to prevent them from reaching their target.
If your group is not crowd-controlling the Illusionary Vulpins, be sure to kill it quickly.
Use your defensives during the [‍Guessing Game].
When casting ‍[[‍Acid Expulsion]] the boss tries to predict the movement of the players from the previous ‍‍Acid Expulsion. Try not to move too much during it to make dodging later on easier.
Save ‍[‍Alter Time] and ‍[‍Shimmer] to quickly break ‍[‍Mind Link].
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
[‍Spirit Bolt] from Drust Harvester.
[‍Harvest Essence] from Drust Harvester.
[‍Nourish the Forest] from Mistveil Tender.
[‍Bramblethorn Coat] from Mistveil Shaper.
[‍Stimulate Regeneration] from Spinemaw Staghorn.
[‍Stimulate Resistance] from Spinemaw Staghorn.
Use defensives if you're targeted by [‍Heaving Retch].
Make sure to always have distance between you and Carrion Worms as their bites are very deadly.

If any adds are still alive during [‍Final Harvest], you can try sniping them with a [[‍Dragon's Breath]] to crowd-control them. With them crowd-controlled, the boss doesn't cast [‍Tortured Echoes] even though an add is alive. Be careful though as ‍Dragon's Breath breaks from any damage so you need to be really precise with it.
Be ready to interrupt casters that spawn from [‍Land of the Dead] so it is easier to gather them.
Always be ready to [‍Shimmer] towards Surgeon Stitchflesh's grandstand to line up [‍Meat Hooks] whenever you are targeted.
Be ready to [‍Shimmer] into a corner when targeted by [‍Frozen Binds] in a bad spot.

Whenever you get targeted by [‍Dark Exile], always make sure to use [‍Mirror Image] when you fight the add downstairs. That is going to allow you to deal with it easily without taking any damage from add.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
[‍Drain Fluids] from Corpse Harvester and Corpse Collector.
[‍Necrotic Bolt] from Zolramus Sorceror & Zolarmus Necromancer.
[‍Rasping Scream] from Skeletal Marauder.
[‍Frostbolt Volley] from Reanimted Mage.
[‍Goresplatter] from Corpse Collector.
[‍Repair Flesh] from Flesh Crafter.
Line up your cooldowns with the boss walking over Bombs, which afflict him with [‍Heavy Ordnance].
Watchout for Bombs and plan your movement accordingly.
Always keep in mind that boss phases at 66% and 33% and there is a short delay before the intermission starts. So make sure to not use big cds right before the intermission.
Focus down the Ashvane Cannoneer during the intermission to quickly use [‍Unstable Ordnance] to get the boss down from the ship.
Be careful where you position yourself during ‍[‍Break Water] as they leave water pools which may make hiding from ‍Tidal Surge harder than it should be.
If you can't find a safe spot for [‍Tidal Surge], you can try using [‍Shimmer] or [‍Alter Time] to teleport over the waves. It is very risky and should only be used as a last resort.
Be ready to utilize [‍Alter Time] whenever [‍Slam] knockback from the Demolishing Terror is coming.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
[‍Brackish Bolt] from Irontide Waveshaper.
[‍Watertight Shell] from Irontide Waveshaper.
[‍Water Bolt] from Bilge Rat Tempest.
[‍Choking Waters] from Bilge Rat Tempest.
[‍Bolstering Shout] from Ashvane Commander.
Make sure to keep track of [‍Shimmer] and [‍Alter Time] to always have an easy time dealing with [‍Shadow Breath] and not dying to it by accident.
Try to place ‍[‍Rumbling Earth] on the edges of the room.
Use defensives for [‍Commanding Roar].
Use defensives during [‍Blistering Heat].
Use defensive during [‍Twilight Buffet].
Watchout for your teammates and help them with slowing the add if anyone is struggling with it.
Keep in mind that Drahga Shadowburner at the start is not the main boss and doesn't have that much HP so don't overcommit to it. Valiona that appears later on also dies at 50% so plan accordingly.
Use defensives during [‍Abyssal Corruption] and [‍Void Surge].
Be careful with AoE as killing Twilight Hatchling applies a ‍[‍Shadow Wound] on your group which may lead to bad overlaps with ‍[‍Shadow Gale].
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
[‍Earth Bolt] from Twilight Earthcaller.
[‍Mass Tremor] from Twilight Earthcaller.
[‍Shadowflame Bolt] from Twilight Beguiler.
[‍Sear Mind] from Twilight Beguiler.

[‍Alerting Shrill does a good amount of AoE damage and summons 4 eggs stacked in a corner of the room. These eggs hatch into ]Starved Crawler[, who then cast ‍Hunger and fixate on the other players in your group.]

spells.title: ‍Alerting Shrill does a good amount of AoE damage and summons 4 eggs stacked in a corner of the room. These eggs hatch into
, who then cast ‍Hunger and fixate on the other players in your group.

children.totalText: Your goal is to keep the boss away from them because if Avanoxx gets close she eats them and gets a stack of [‍Insatiable] per Crawler eaten.
Use [‍Ring of Peace] to keep the Crawlers away from the boss.
The boss receiving any stack of [‍Insatiable] likely results in a wipe.
Use [‍Ring of Peace] to keep the Crawlers away from the boss.
The boss receiving any stack of [‍Insatiable] likely results in a wipe.
[‍Gossamer Onslaught] spawns [‍Vile Webbing] under every player while being cast so stacking up with your group or melee friend is  recommended to conserve space.

[‍Voracious Bite] is the tank mechanic, hitting you for 3 strikes back to back inflicting a 50% damage taken increase per stack which ends up being a 150% damage taken increase for the following melee swings.
Use [‍Celestial Brew] for every single one.
Rotate betwen [‍Dampen Harm] and [‍Fortifying Brew] if needed.

[‍Impale] is aimed at you while tanking the boss, resulting in a huge frontal cone that you can aim. You don't need to tank this mechanic but you need to aim it away from the team as best as possible.
[‍Burrow Charge]
The boss targets a player in your group and proceeds to go underground and charge that player, immediately afterwards he casts [‍Impale] so make sure to aim that frontal well.
[‍Infestation] spawns a [‍Ceaseless Swarm], just don't stand in it.
During [‍Eye of the Swarm] the boss creates a zone in front of the boss that is a "safe space". It moves together with the bosses' facing, so you are responsible for moving the zone around.
[‍Impale] is being cast during the phase making the "safe zone" even smaller. Make sure you aim it at either side of the safe zone and not in the middle.
Throughout the fight Bloodstained Webmage spawn casting [‍Silken Restraints] at someone random during the fight.
Make sure to drag the boss close to them to cleave them down.
Use [‍Ring of Peace] to interrupt and get them under the boss to cleave them down.
[‍Cosmic Singularity] requires you to stand in [‍Grasping Blood] while the cast is finishing.
[‍Transcendence] can be used to outplay this mechanic.
[‍Cosmic Singularity] grips you into the boss at 1 second left of the cast, so wait for the grip in and cast [‍Transcendence: Transfer] right after to be safe.
[‍Cultivated Poisons] does a lot of damage to you while also shooting out waves to dodge when it expires or gets dispelled.
Use [‍Detox] to dispel this debuff from one of your party members to help your healer.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
Trilling Attendant - [‍Resonant Barrage]
Ixin - [‍Horrifying Shrill]
Bloodstained Webmage - [‍Revolting Volley]
Blood Overseer - [‍Venom Volley]
Pay extra attention to these casts:
Sentry Stagshell - [‍Alarm Shrill]
A really long cast that needs to get disrupted.
Helpful spells against this are [‍Leg Sweep], [‍Ring of Peace] and [‍Paralysis].
Nerubian Hauler and Hulking Bloodguard - [‍Massive Slam]
A short stun that ramps in damage done per cast.
Engorged Crawler - [‍Venomous Spit]
Make sure to dispell the debuff with [‍Detox] on your party members.
Reinforced Drone - [‍Grasping Slash]
A stacking debuff that slows you per stack, you can use [‍Tiger's Lust] to remove all stacks.
A really long cast that needs to get disrupted.
Helpful spells against this are [‍Leg Sweep], [‍Ring of Peace] and [‍Paralysis].
A short stun that ramps in damage done per cast.
Make sure to dispell the debuff with [‍Detox] on your party members.
A stacking debuff that slows you per stack, you can use [‍Tiger's Lust] to remove all stacks.

[‍Chains of Oppression] creates a circle around the boss preventing anyone from moving more than 10 yards away from the boss. You are responsible for dragging the boss and the team around so keep that in mind.
[‍Subjugate] is a big magical tank hit that reduces your movement speed by 30% for 10 seconds after being hit.
Utilize [‍Tiger's Lust] to dispel the slow on yourself.
[‍Terrorize] is not a tank frontal so you can dodge it when it happens.
[‍Shadows of Doubt] creates balls to dodge when dispelled, make sure to dodge these.
[‍Vociferous Indoctrination] is a big group AoE mechanic that creates [‍Lingering Influence] after being cast.
Move the boss quickly after this cast is finished to guarantee no one stands in the pool on the ground afterwards.
Use the ingame ping system to indicate where you want to move the boss after the AoE has happened so your team is aware of the upcoming boss movement.
The fight starts with Vx being stationary, this alternates after every intermission so try to keep the moveable boss always on top of the stationary boss.

The first tank mechanic, [‍Shade Slash] from Nx, deals damage to you and leaves behind an echo of the boss. You want to move the boss out of this echo as [‍Duskbringer] creates a big circle AoE around the boss and any echo left behind.
[‍Synergic Step] happens at 100 Energy. The 2 bosses jump away and swap their ability sets.

After Vx becomes the attacker, the other tank mechanic [‍Rime Dagger] activates. It does a bigger hit to you and applies [‍Freezing Blood] which makes stacking together with your group mandatory to remove this debuff.
Use [‍Celestial Brew] on this hit.
[‍Viscous Darkness] summons orbs around the room that need to be soaked before they touch the boss.
[‍Corrupted Coating] get applied by soaking a orb.
[‍Oozing Smash] is a magic tank hit that slows you.
[‍Blood Surge]
Position the Boss at the edge of the room to maximize the amount of usable space as [‍Blood Surge] creates a pool under the boss.
[‍Shifting Anomalies] shoots 3 orbs towards players for this mechanic. Make sure to keep the boss together with the whole group and dodge as a group when needed.
[‍Tremor Slam]
This mechanic requires you to run out of melee and be ready to pick up aggro on the Ravenous Scarab spawning afterwards.
[‍Umbral Weave]
Applies webs to all players in the group, rooting them unless destroyed. As with [‍Shifting Anomalies], keep the boss close to your group.
You can use [‍Tiger's Lust] to help free someone when they're dangerously low on HP.
[‍Process of Elimination]
This mechanic creates a big circle around you that can not hit anyone but yourself. Step away from the team to not hit them while tanking this mechanic.
Use [‍Celestial Brew] on every single one.
Rotate through [‍Diffuse Magic] and [‍Dampen Harm].
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
Sureki Silkbinder - [‍Silk Binding]
Herald of Ansurek - [‍Twist Thoughts]
Covert Webmancer - [‍Mending Web]
Sureki Unnaturaler - [‍Void Wave]
Pay extra attention to these casts:
Eye of the Queen - [‍Void Rush]
Royal Venomshell - [‍Venomous Spray]
[‍Seismic Smash] does massive physical damage to you and is very dangerous.
[‍Seismic Reverberation] is applied after tanking the hit.
This debuff is a magic dot that can be dispelled.
When dispelled you gain [‍Stone Shield].
The goal is to tank the first [‍Seismic Smash] and get dispelled to receive [‍Stone Shield] for the following one.
When dispelled you gain [‍Stone Shield].
The goal is to tank the first [‍Seismic Smash] and get dispelled to receive [‍Stone Shield] for the following one.
Use [‍Celestial Brew] or [‍Dampen Harm] whenever tanking the first one.
Do not use [‍Diffuse Magic] while you are afflicted by [‍Seismic Reverberation].
[‍Volatile Spike] spawns spikes under 3 random players. For this stack up with your group.
[‍Refracting Beam] targets random players which can then clear the [‍Volatile Spikes].
Position the boss in a line towards the spikes to make clearing easy.
[‍Crystalline Smash] summons 3 Crystal Shards around the room.
Move the boss from Crystal Shard to Crystal Shard and kill them one after another while letting the [‍Crystalline Eruption] debuff fall off between kills.
[‍Unstable Crash] summons [‍Unstable Energy] per player.
Don't soak these as a tank, leave them for your DPS and Healer.
[‍Activate Ventilation]
Creates flame pools on the ground. Check early for a safe space for [‍Scrap Song].
[‍Molten Metal]
Help interrupt this mechanic.
Use [‍Tiger's Lust] to dispel this debuff if the cast went off.
[‍Scrap Song]
Move the boss to the side of the room to avoid the cube in the middle of the room.
[‍Blazing Crescendo]
Similar to [‍Scrap Song], position the boss at one of the tips of the cube to avoid the lava waves.
[‍Igneous Hammer]
Deals high magic damage. Use [‍Celestial Brew] or any other defensive when possible.
[‍Void Corruption]
Applies a debuff to you that you need to clear with [‍Void Rift].
Place [‍Transcendence] before bringing the debuff to the portal so you can [‍Transcendence: Transfer] back to the boss and keep him more in the middle of the room.
Use [‍Tiger's Lust] on slower classes such as Priests while they carry the debuff to a portal.
Since you're a tank, let your team mates clear their debuff first before clearing your own debuff, use defensives such as [‍Dampen Harm], [‍Diffuse Magic] or [‍Fortifying Brew] if needed.
[‍Entropic Reckoning]
Drop a zone when the cast is finished so be sure to place your circle at the edge of the room.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
Ghastly Voidsoul - [‍Howling Fear]
Void Bound Howler - [‍Piercing Wail]
Forgebound Mender - [‍Restoring Metals]
Pay extra attention to these casts:
Void Bound Despoiler - [‍Void Storm]
Rock Smasher - [‍Smash Rock]
Be careful where you tank the Rock Smasher so your team does not get knocked back into other packs.
Cursedforge Honor Guard - [‍Shield Stampede]
Be careful where you tank the Rock Smasher so your team does not get knocked back into other packs.
Pay extra attention to these casts:
Earth Burst Totem casts [‍Earth Burst] which needs to be killed before it goes off.
[‍Darkness Comes]
When flying out and coming back be ready to interrupt [‍Shadow Bolt].
[‍Obsidian Beam]
This mechanic's initial hit always hits you as a tank.
It deals a lot of damage so make sure you press a defensive here.
[‍Collapsing Night]
Targets 2 ranged players if available and spawns void zones under them.
Tank the boss towards the edge of the platform and rotate whenever this happens to min-max the room.
[‍Dark Orb]
Tank the boss in an open space so the orb can be aimed as far away as possible.
[‍Terrifying Slam]
Find a corner to stand against so the knock-up is prevented as much as possible.
Use [‍Celestial Brew] on every single one of these.
[‍Animate Shadows]
Spawns Animate Shadows that cast [‍Congealed Darkness].
Be ready to pick up aggro and interrupt them if needed.
Use [‍Leg Sweep] to stun them when stacked up.
[‍Arathi Bomb]
The explosion does a lot of damage [‍Diffuse Magic] is recommended if it goes off.
[‍Acidic Eruption]
Interrupt this after flying to the boss to start stage 2.
[‍Tacky Burst]
This prevents you from moving away from the boss. Make sure you always stick to the boss and never leave melee.
[‍Spinneret's Strands]
Help players who get this mechanic with [‍Tiger's Lust].
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
Nightfall Shadowmage - [‍Ensnaring Shadows]
Nightfall Commander - [‍Abyssal Howl]
Nightfall Darkcaster - [‍Tormenting Beam]
Pay extra attention to these casts:
Anub'ikkaj and Ixkreten the Unbreakable - [‍Terrifying Slam]
Nightfall Dark Architect - [‍Usher Reinforcements]
Nightfall Commander - [‍Tainted Slash]
Anub'ikkaj and Deathscreamer Iken'tak - [‍Dark Orb]
Anub'ikkaj and Ascendant Vis'coxria - [‍Shadowy Decay]
[‍Spirit Bolt]
Interrupt this cast whenever possible.
[‍Repulsive Visage]
Place a [‍Transcendence] before to get back fast for an interrupt on the boss.
[‍Embrace Darkness]
Forces you to hit Droman Oulfarran.
[‍Bewildering Pollen]
This frontal is aimed at you so don't aim it at the ranged team.
[‍Droman's Wrath]
Save damage abilities for this phase.
[‍Patty Cake]
This cast is solely for you and needs to be interrupted by you.
[‍Freeze Tag]
Summons Illusionary Vulpin fixating [‍Freeze Tag Fixation] on a player.
If not touched or spawned far away use [‍Paralysis] to CC it.
[‍Accelerated Incubation]
Summons Gormling Larva, make sure to pick them up and bring them under the boss for cleave damage.
[‍Marked Prey] makes them fixate on a player so support them with your slows.
Use [‍Ring of Peace] right before the Gormling Larva die, to move them away from the group, since they leave a pool on the ground after death.
[‍Mind Link]
This ability will always go on you now. Use [‍Tiger's Lust] or [‍Roll] to break the links.
[‍Coalescing Poison]
This creates a big circle around to boss while sucking you in. Run against it to not die.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
Drust Harvester - [‍Harvest Essence]
Mistveil Tender - [‍Nourish the Forest]
Spinemaw Staghorn - [‍Stimulate Resistance]
Pay extra attention to these casts:
Drust Spiteclaw - [‍Dying Breath]
This debuffs enemies as well as players.
Tirnenn Villager - [‍Overgrowth]
Drust Boughbreaker - [‍Furious Thrashing]
Triggers at 50% HP of the Drust Boughbreaker.
Mistveil Guardian - [‍Anima Slash]
Big tank buster, rotate your defensives for it.
This debuffs enemies as well as players.
Triggers at 50% HP of the Drust Boughbreaker.
Big tank buster, rotate your defensives for it.
Mistveil Defender - [‍Mist Ward]
Big zone to move the enemies out of.
Mistveil Stalker - [‍Mistveil Bite]
Mistveil Stinger - [‍Anima Injection]
Spinemaw Staghorn - [‍Acid Nova]
Big zone to move the enemies out of.
[‍Heaving Retch]
Spawns Carrion Worm, utilize your slows while killing these.
Use [‍Ring of Peace] to keep them away from group members.
[‍Fetid Gas]
Position the boss close to other pools to maximize room usage as Fetid Gas creates a pool under the boss.
[‍Crunch]
Physical tank hit.
[‍Land of the Dead]
Move the boss close to the Reanimated Crosbowman while interrupting the Reanimated Mage.
Use [‍Ring of Peace] to get any far away adds closer to each other.
[‍Leg Sweep] the adds when the boss is free-casting [‍Necrotic Bolt].
[‍Unholy Frenzy]
If your group cant purge this Enrage effect, watch your health since the boss starts doing a lot more damage.
[‍Necrotic Bolt]
Interrupt this as much as possible.
[‍Awaken Creation]
Always make sure to pick up Stitchflesh's Creation. They spawn in one of the back corners of the room looking at the boss.
Position the Stitchflesh's Creation in the middle of the room to make aiming [‍Meat Hook] easy.
[‍Meat Hook]
Use [‍Tiger's Lust] on the [‍Meat Hook] target.
[‍Sever Flesh]
Physical tank hit.
[‍Escape]
After this is cast position Stitchflesh's Creation in the middle.
[‍Comet Storm]
Stack up with your melees to dodge this mechanic together.
[‍Icy Shard]
This tank hit is being cast at you all the time and does high physical damage to you.
[‍Frozen Binds]
This can be dispelled by your [‍Tiger's Lust].
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
Corpse Harvester - [‍Drain Fluids]
Skeletal Marauder - [‍Rasping Scream]
Corpse Collector - [‍Goresplatter]
Pay extra attention to these casts:
Zolramus Necromancer - [‍Grim Fate]
Zolramus Sorcerer - [‍Shadow Well]
Move when this ability is being casted to avoid getting hit.
Move when this ability is being casted to avoid getting hit.
Skeletal Marauder - [‍Gruesome Cleave]
Fast frontal cast.
Zolramus Bonecarver - [‍Boneflay]
Reduces your max hp per stack, start kiting if necessary.
Flesh Crafter - [‍Throw Cleaver]
This spell also does damage to enemies and should be aimed at any enemy to deal extra damage.
Help with this by positioning the mobs in front of the Flesh Crafter.
Help with this by positioning the mobs in front of the Flesh Crafter.
Loyal Creation - [‍Spine Crush]
A big circle cast that can't be disrupted as it recasts until the cast is finished once.
Fast frontal cast.
Reduces your max hp per stack, start kiting if necessary.
This spell also does damage to enemies and should be aimed at any enemy to deal extra damage.
Help with this by positioning the mobs in front of the Flesh Crafter.
A big circle cast that can't be disrupted as it recasts until the cast is finished once.
[‍On the Hook]
The boss is fixating on players and is not tankable. You are responsible for the adds.
Help out the fixated player with [‍Tiger's Lust] if needed.
Every 25% boss HP he calls in 1 Irontide Cleaver and 1 Irontide Powdershot
Help out the fixated player with [‍Tiger's Lust] if needed.
Irontide Cleaver
[‍Heavy Slash]

Drust Boughbreaker - [‍Furious Thrashing]
Triggers at 50% HP of the Drust Boughbreaker. Make sure to have healing cooldowns ready for it.
Mistveil Defender - [‍Mist Ward]
Big zone to move the enemies out of.
Mistveil Stalker - [‍Mistveil Bite]
Can remove it with [‍Blessing of Protection].
Mistveil Stinger - [‍Anima Injection]
Poison dispel.
Spinemaw Staghorn - [‍Acid Nova]
This debuffs enemies as well as players.
Triggers at 50% HP of the Drust Boughbreaker. Make sure to have healing cooldowns ready for it.
Big zone to move the enemies out of.
Can remove it with [‍Blessing of Protection].
Poison dispel.
General TipsGeneral TipsOutput CdsPersonal/External
Use [‍Hammer of Justice] on any adds close to melee.
Dispel a disease after each [‍Heaving Retch] cast.
General TipsGeneral TipsOutput CdsPersonal/External
Use everything to maximize your damage as there is no AoE damage on this boss.
General TipsGeneral TipsOutput CdsPersonal/External
Rotate your defensives whenever targeted by [‍Heaving Retch]. In high keys [‍Divine Protection] might not be enough so pair it up with [‍Aura Mastery].
General TipsOutput CdsPersonal/External

Be ready to use [‍Hammer of Justice] or [‍Blinding Light] if [‍Final Harvest] cast is about to finish and there is still some adds alive. As long as they are CC'd as the cast finishes it will prevent them from exploding and save you a wipe.
General TipsOutput CdsPersonal/External
Save your healing cooldowns for after [‍Final Harvest] is completed as that is the only time AoE damage happens.
General TipsOutput CdsPersonal/External
Ensure to have a defensive active whenever you group runs out of interupts and you are targeted by  [‍Necrotic Bolt].
General TipsGeneral TipsOutput CdsPersonal/External
The most important part about this encounter is to hit the hook at the correct time, use your [‍Divine Steed] if you are targeted by it.
Use [‍Blessing of Protection] if the hook fails to stop  [‍Morbid Fixation] to help a fixated player.
General TipsGeneral TipsOutput CdsPersonal/External
Save your healing cooldowns for when multiple abominations are active as [‍Festering Rot] does heavy group damage.
General TipsGeneral TipsOutput CdsPersonal/External
Ensure to have a defensive active whenever you are targeted with [‍Stitchneedle] and there is  [‍Festering Rot] pulsing on top of it.
General TipsOutput CdsPersonal/External
Pre-use [‍Blessing of Freedom] on players targeted with [‍Frozen Binds] to immune the application.
General TipsOutput CdsPersonal/External
Save your healing cooldowns for [‍Icebound Aegis] as this is the only time AoE damage happens.
General TipsOutput CdsPersonal/External
Rotate through your defensive arsenal whenever [‍Icebound Aegis] is active on the boss.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
Corpse Harvester - [‍Drain Fluids]
Stitched Vanguard - [‍Meat Shield]
Skeletal Marauder - [‍Rasping Scream]
Corpse Collector - [‍Goresplatter]
Pay extra attention to these casts:
Zolramus Necromancer - [‍Grim Fate]
Skeletal Marauder - [‍Gruesome Cleave]
Fast frontal cast.
Flesh Crafter - [‍Throw Cleaver]
This spell also does damage to enemies and should be aimed at any enemy to deal extra damage.
Help with this by positioning the mobs in front of the Flesh Crafter.
Help with this by positioning the mobs in front of the Flesh Crafter.
Loyal Creation - [‍Spine Crush]
A big circle cast that can't be disrupted as it recasts until the cast is finished once.
Fast frontal cast.
This spell also does damage to enemies and should be aimed at any enemy to deal extra damage.
Help with this by positioning the mobs in front of the Flesh Crafter.
A big circle cast that can't be disrupted as it recasts until the cast is finished once.
General TipsGeneral TipsOutput CdsPersonal/External
Look out for clutch [‍Blessing of Protection] use on players fixated with  [‍On the Hook].
General TipsGeneral TipsOutput CdsPersonal/External
Save your healing cooldowns for when [‍Gore Crash] happens to ensure nobody gets executed by a [‍Molten Slug].
General TipsGeneral TipsOutput CdsPersonal/External
Ensure to have a defensive active when targeted by [‍Molten Slug] and [‍Gore Crash] is about to happen.
Output CdsPersonal/External
Cycle through your healing cooldowns to for every [‍Fiery Ricochet].
Output CdsPersonal/External
Ensure to have a personal defensive active for [‍Fiery Ricochet].
General TipsGeneral TipsOutput CdsPersonal/External
Use [‍Divine Steed]  on every set of  [‍Tidal Surge] waves.
General TipsGeneral TipsOutput CdsPersonal/External
[‍Break Water] is the only damage event on this boss. Ensure people are always topped before this.
General TipsGeneral TipsOutput CdsPersonal/External
Rotate through your defensive arsenal whenever [‍Break Water] happens.
General TipsGeneral TipsOutput CdsPersonal/External
Always have your group be spread to be able to instantly dispel a [‍Putrid Waters].
General TipsGeneral TipsOutput CdsPersonal/External
Spot heal [‍Putrid Waters] whenever [‍Slam] happens.
General TipsGeneral TipsOutput CdsPersonal/External
Whenever you tank [‍Putrid Waters] for its duration ensure to have a defensive active.
Use [‍Blessing of Sacrifice] on [‍Putrid Waters] targetes without defensives.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
Ashvane Commander - [‍Bolstering Shout]
Bilge Rat Tempest - [‍Choking Waters]
Bilge Rat Pillager - [‍Stinky Vomit]
Pay extra attention to these casts:
Scrimshaw Enforcer - [‍Slobber Knocker]
Casts a frontal cone that is hard to see.
Irontide Raider - [‍Iron Hook] into [‍Savage Tempest]
Blacktar Bomber - [‍Fire Bomb]
Ashvane Commander - [‍Azerite Charge]
Irontide Powdershot - [‍Molten Slug]
Ashvane Spotter - [‍Sighted Artillery]
Bilge Rat Demolisher - [‍Crushing Slam]
Casts a frontal cone that is hard to see.
General TipsGeneral TipsOutput CdsPersonal/External
Use [‍Divine Steed] to quickly dodge [‍Shadow Breath].
General TipsGeneral TipsOutput CdsPersonal/External
You can rotate[‍Holy Prism] [‍Divine Toll] to top your group between each [‍Commanding Roar].
General TipsGeneral TipsOutput CdsPersonal/External
Ensure to use [‍Divine Protection] whenever you can before [‍Commanding Roar] happens.
General TipsGeneral TipsPersonal/External
Bait [‍Fiery Cleave] to the nearest wall to save boss room space.
General TipsGeneral TipsPersonal/External
Use [‍Divine Protection] on every overlap of [‍Molten Flurry] and [‍Forge Swords].
General TipsGeneral TipsOutput CdsPersonal/External
Use [‍Hammer of Justice] to help players fixated with [‍Flaming Fixate].
General TipsGeneral TipsOutput CdsPersonal/External
Make sure to top everyone before each [‍Twilight Buffet] cast.
General TipsGeneral TipsOutput CdsPersonal/External
Rotate personal defensives for every [‍Twilight Buffet] cast.
General TipsGeneral TipsPersonal/External
Use [‍Divine Steed] whenever [‍Shadow Gale] happens.
General TipsGeneral TipsPersonal/External
Ensure to have [‍Divine Protection] active for every [‍Abyssal Corruption] cast.
On 3rd [‍Shadow Gale] use [‍Divine Shield] to clear tentacles blocking the path to safety.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
Twilight Earthcaller - [‍Mass Tremor]
Twilight Beguiler - [‍Sear Mind]
Pay extra attention to these casts:
Twilight Destroyer - [‍Umbral Wind]
You can LoS this cast.
You can LoS this cast.
Molten Giant - [‍Molten Wake]
Massive AoE damage to whole group.
Massive AoE damage to whole group.
Twilight Lavabender - [‍Ascension] and [‍Dark Eruption]
[‍Ascension] triggers at 50% HP and starts pulsing [‍Scorching Heat] group damage. Save healing cooldowns for that.
[‍Ascension] triggers at 50% HP and starts pulsing [‍Scorching Heat] group damage. Save healing cooldowns for that.
Twilight Warlock - [‍Enveloping Shadowflame]
Twilight Enforcer - [‍Ramping Rage]
Mutated Hatchling - [‍Shadow Wound]
Faceless Corruptor - [‍Corrupt] and [‍Mind Piercer]

[‍Alerting Shrill does a good amount of AoE damage and summons 4 eggs stacked in a corner of the room. These eggs hatch into ]Starved Crawler[, who then cast ‍Hunger and fixate on the other players in your group.]

spells.title: ‍Alerting Shrill does a good amount of AoE damage and summons 4 eggs stacked in a corner of the room. These eggs hatch into
, who then cast ‍Hunger and fixate on the other players in your group.

children.totalText: Your goal is to keep the the boss away from them because if Avanoxx gets close she eats them and gets a stack of [‍Insatiable] per Crawler eaten.
The boss receiving any stack of [‍Insatiable] likely results in a wipe.
The boss receiving any stack of [‍Insatiable] likely results in a wipe.
[‍Gossamer Onslaught] spawns [‍Vile Webbing] under every player while being cast so stacking up with your group or melee friend is  recommended to conserve space.

[‍Voracious Bite] is the tank mechanic, hitting you for 3 strikes back to back inflicting a 50% damage taken increase per stack which ends up being a 150% damage taken increase for the following melee swings.
Rotating strong defensives for this boss is wise at this mechanic hurts a lot and the boss can be very scary because of it.
Its very wise to [‍Divine Shield] or [‍Guardian of Ancient Kings] the overlap of [‍Voracious Bite] and [‍Alerting Shrill] as it does very life threatening damage combined.

[‍Impale] is aimed at you while tanking the boss, resulting in a huge frontal cone that you can aim. You don't need to tank this mechanic but you need to aim it away from the team as best as possible.
[‍Burrow Charge]
The boss targets a player in your group and proceeds to goes underground and charge that player, immediately afterwards he casts [‍Impale] so make sure to aim that frontal well.
[‍Infestation] spawns a [‍Ceaseless Swarm], just don't stand in it.
You can [‍Divine Shield] before [‍Infestation] runs out so it does not spawn [‍Ceaseless Swarm].
During [‍Eye of the Swarm] the boss creates a zone in front of the boss that is a "safe space". It moves together with the bosses' facing, so you are responsible for moving the zone around.
[‍Impale] is being cast during the phase making the "safe zone" even smaller. Make sure you aim it at either side of the safe zone and not in the middle.
Throughout the fight Bloodstained Webmage spawn casting [‍Silken Restraints] at someone random during the fight.
Make sure to drag the boss close to them to cleave them down.
[‍Cosmic Singularity] requires you to stand in [‍Grasping Blood] while the cast is finishing.
Get rid of this mechanic with [‍Blessing of Freedom] after [‍Cosmic Singularity] has ended.
[‍Cultivated Poisons] does a lot of damage to you while also shooting out waves to dodge when it expires.
Use [‍Guardian of Ancient Kings] or [‍Ardent Defender] to tank this mechanic.
You can also pre-use [‍Divine Shield] and [‍Blessing of Spellwarding] to immune the application.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
Trilling Attendant - [‍Resonant Barrage]
Ixin - [‍Horrifying Shrill]
Bloodstained Webmage - [‍Revolting Volley]
Blood Overseer - [‍Venom Volley]
Pay extra attention to these casts:
Sentry Stagshell - [‍Alarm Shrill]
A really long cast that needs to get disrupted.
Nerubian Hauler and Hulking Bloodguard - [‍Massive Slam]
A short stun that ramps in damage done per cast.
A really long cast that needs to get disrupted.
A short stun that ramps in damage done per cast.

[‍Chains of Oppression] creates a circle around the boss preventing anyone from moving more than 10 yards away from the boss. You are responsible for dragging the boss and the team around so keep that in mind.
[‍Subjugate] is a big magical tank hit that reduces your movement speed by 30% for 10 seconds after being hit.
Rotate [‍Blessing of Spellwarding] and [‍Divine Shield] to deal with this mechanic and immune the damage and slow effect.
Moreover, cast strong defensives and then cast[‍Blessing of Freedom] to remove the slow.
[‍Terrorize] is not a tank frontal so you can dodge it when it happens.
[‍Shadows of Doubt] creates balls to dodge when dispelled, make sure to dodge these.
If you would get hit use [‍Divine Shield] to break the stun.
[‍Vociferous Indoctrination] is a big group AoE mechanic that creates [‍Lingering Influence] after being cast.
Move the boss quickly after this cast is finished to guarantee no one stands in the pool on the ground afterwards.

The first tank mechanic, [‍Shade Slash] from Nx, deals damage to you and leaves behind an echo of the boss. You want to move the boss out of this echo as [‍Duskbringer] creates a big circle AoE around the boss and any echo left behind.
[‍Synergic Step] happens at 100 Energy. The 2 bosses jump away and swap their ability sets.

After Vx becomes the attacker, the other tank mechanic [‍Rime Dagger] activates. It does a bigger hit to you and applies [‍Freezing Blood] which makes stacking together with your group mandatory to remove this debuff.
Immuning [‍Freezing Blood] with [‍Divine Shield] and [‍Blessing of Spellwarding] can be very useful.
[‍Viscous Darkness] summons orbs around the room that need to be soaked before they touch the boss.
[‍Corrupted Coating] get applied by soaking a orb.
[‍Divine Shield] and [‍Blessing of Spellwarding] immunes the application of [‍Corrupted Coating].
[‍Oozing Smash] is the magic tank hit which slows you afterwards.
Pre use [‍Blessing of Freedom] to deal with this.
[‍Blood Surge]
Position the Boss at the edge of the room to maximize the amount of usable space as [‍Blood Surge] creates a pool under the boss.
[‍Shifting Anomalies] shoots 3 orbs towards players for this mechanic. Make sure to keep the boss together with the whole group and dodge as a group when needed.
[‍Splice]
Can be immuned with [‍Blessing of Spellwarding] and [‍Divine Shield].
[‍Tremor Slam]
This mechanic requires you to run out of melee and be ready to pick up aggro on the Ravenous Scarab spawning afterwards.
[‍Umbral Weave]
Applies webs to all players in the group, rooting them unless destroyed. As with [‍Shifting Anomalies], keep the boss close to your group.
[‍Blessing of Freedom] is very useful to remove the roots.
[‍Process of Elimination]
This mechanic creates a big circle around you that can not hit anyone but yourself. Step away from the team to not hit them while tanking this mechanic.
Rotate [‍Ardent Defender] and [‍Guardian of Ancient Kings] to survive.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
Sureki Silkbinder - [‍Silk Binding]
Herald of Ansurek - [‍Twist Thoughts]
Covert Webmancer - [‍Mending Web]
Pay extra attention to these casts:
Eye of the Queen - [‍Void Rush]
Royal Venomshell - [‍Venomous Spray]
[‍Seismic Smash] does massive physical damage to you and is very dangerous.
[‍Seismic Reverberation] is applied after tanking the hit.
This debuff is a magic dot that can be dispelled.
When dispelled you gain [‍Stone Shield].
The goal is to tank the first [‍Seismic Smash] and get dispelled to receive [‍Stone Shield] for the following one.
When dispelled you gain [‍Stone Shield].
The goal is to tank the first [‍Seismic Smash] and get dispelled to receive [‍Stone Shield] for the following one.
Just [‍Ardent Defender] is enough to live the hit, but you will be low health afterwards so be careful.
Do not use [‍Divine Shield] unless you would otherwise die since it immunes [‍Seismic Reverberation].
[‍Volatile Spike] spawns spikes under 3 random players. For this stack up with your group.
[‍Refracting Beam] targets random players which can then clear the [‍Volatile Spikes].
Position the boss in a line towards the spikes to make clearing easy.
With [‍Divine Shield] you can immune the [‍Volatile Spike] debuff stacks.
[‍Crystalline Smash] summons 3 Crystal Shards around the room.
Move the boss from Crystal Shard to Crystal Shard and kill them one after another while letting the [‍Crystalline Eruption] debuff fall off between kills.
[‍Unstable Crash] summons [‍Unstable Energy] per player.
Don't soak these as a tank, leave them for your DPS and Healer.
[‍Activate Ventilation]
Creates flame pools on the ground. Check early for a safe space for [‍Scrap Song].
[‍Molten Metal]
Help interrupt this mechanic.
[‍Scrap Song]
Move the boss to side of the room to avoid the cube in the middle of the room.
[‍Blazing Crescendo]
Similar to [‍Scrap Song], position the boss at one of the tips of the cube to avoid the lava waves.
[‍Igneous Hammer]
Deals high magic damage. Rotate every defensive for each one and be inside [‍Consecration] or you will perish.
[‍Void Corruption]
Applies a debuff to you that you need to clear with [‍Void Rift].
Immune the application of it with [‍Divine Shield] whenever possible.
[‍Entropic Reckoning]
Drop a zone when the cast is finished so be sure to place your circle at the edge of the room.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
Ghastly Voidsoul - [‍Howling Fear]
Void Bound Howler - [‍Piercing Wail]
Pay extra attention to these casts:
Void Bound Despoiler - [‍Void Storm]
Forge Loader - [‍Molten Mortar]
Rock Smasher - [‍Smash Rock]
Cursedforge Honor Guard - [‍Shield Stampede]
Pay extra attention to these casts:
Earth Burst Totem casts [‍Earth Burst] which needs to be killed before it goes off.
[‍Darkness Comes]
When flying out and coming back be ready to interrupt [‍Shadow Bolt].
[‍Obsidian Beam]
This mechanic's initial hit always hits you as a tank.
It deals a lot of damage so make sure you press a defensive here.
[‍Collapsing Night]
Targets 2 ranged players if available and spawns void zones under them.
Tank the boss towards the edge of the platform and rotate whenever this happens to min max the room.
[‍Dark Orb]
Tank the boss in an open space so the orb can be aimed as far away as possible.
[‍Terrifying Slam]
Find a corner to stand against so the knockup is prevented as much as possible.
Use [‍Divine Shield] to immune the knockup.
[‍Animate Shadows]
Spawns Animate Shadows that cast [‍Congealed Darkness].
Be ready to pick up aggro and interrupt them if needed.
Saving [‍Divine Toll] for this is quite wise.
[‍Arathi Bomb]
The explosion can be immuned by [‍Divine Shield].
[‍Acidic Eruption]
Interrupt this after flying to the boss to start stage 2.
[‍Tacky Burst]
This prevents you from moving away from the boss. Make sure you always stick to the boss and never leave melee.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
Nightfall Shadowmage - [‍Ensnaring Shadows]
Nightfall Commander - [‍Abyssal Howl]
Nightfall Darkcaster - [‍Tormenting Beam]
Pay extra attention to these casts:
Anub'ikkaj and Ixkreten the Unbreakable - [‍Terrifying Slam]
Nightfall Dark Architect - [‍Usher Reinforcements]
Anub'ikkaj and Deathscreamer Iken'tak - [‍Dark Orb]
Anub'ikkaj and Ascendant Vis'coxria - [‍Shadowy Decay]
[‍Spirit Bolt]
Interrupt this cast whenever possible.
[‍Repulsive Visage]
This fear can be immuned  with [‍Divine Shield].
[‍Embrace Darkness]
Forces you to hit Droman Oulfarran.
[‍Bewildering Pollen]
This frontal is aimed at you so don't aim it at the ranged team.
[‍Droman's Wrath]
Save damage abilities for this phase.
[‍Patty Cake]
This cast is solely for you and needs to be interrupted by you.
[‍Freeze Tag]
Summons Illusionary Vulpin fixating [‍Freeze Tag Fixation] on a player.
Use [‍Hammer of Justice] to stun them when they spawn.
[‍Consumption]
Interrupt this after breaking the shield on the boss.
[‍Accelerated Incubation]
Summons Gormling Larva, make sure to pick them up and bring them under the boss for cleave damage.
[‍Marked Prey] makes them fixate on a player. Help them with [‍Blessing of Protection] and [‍Blessing of Sacrifice] if needed.
[‍Mind Link]
Utilize [‍Divine Shield] to immune the link on you.
[‍Coalescing Poison]
This creates a big circle around to boss while sucking you in. Run against it to not die.
Use [‍Divine Steed] to run against the pull in.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
Drust Harvester - [‍Harvest Essence]
Spinemaw Staghorn - [‍Stimulate Resistance]
Pay extra attention to these casts:
Drust Spiteclaw - [‍Dying Breath]
This debuffs enemies as well as players.
Tirnenn Villager - [‍Overgrowth]
Drust Boughbreaker - [‍Furious Thrashing]
Triggers at 50% HP of the Drust Boughbreaker.
Mistveil Defender - [‍Mist Ward]
Big zone to move the enemies out of.
Mistveil Stalker - [‍Mistveil Bite]
Mistveil Stinger - [‍Anima Injection]
Spinemaw Staghorn - [‍Acid Nova]
This debuffs enemies as well as players.
Triggers at 50% HP of the Drust Boughbreaker.
Big zone to move the enemies out of.
[‍Heaving Retch]
Spawns Carrion Worm, use [‍Hammer of Justice] to stun one and [‍Blinding Light] to cancel their cast on your allies.
[‍Fetid Gas]
Position the boss close to other pools to maximize room usage as Fetid Gas creates a pool under the boss.
[‍Crunch]
Physical tank hit that you should try and rotate defensives for and use [‍Word of Glory] to heal yourself instantly afterwards.
[‍Land of the Dead]
Move the boss close to the Reanimated Crosbowman while interrupting the Reanimated Mage.
[‍Unholy Frenzy]
If your group cant purge this Enrage effect, watch your health since the boss starts doing a lot more damage.
[‍Necrotic Bolt]
Interrupt this as much as possible.
[‍Awaken Creation]
Always make sure to pick up Stitchflesh's Creation. They spawn in one of the back corners of the room looking at the boss.
Position the Stitchflesh's Creation in the middle of the room to make aiming [‍Meat Hook] easy.
[‍Sever Flesh]
Physical tank hit.
[‍Escape]
After this is cast position Stitchflesh's Creation in the middle.
[‍Comet Storm]
Stack up with your melees to dodge this mechanic together.
[‍Icy Shard]
This tank hit is being cast at you all the time and does high physical damage to you.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
Corpse Harvester - [‍Drain Fluids]
Stitched Vanguard - [‍Meat Shield]
Skeletal Marauder - [‍Rasping Scream]
Corpse Collector - [‍Goresplatter]
Pay extra attention to these casts:
Zolramus Necromancer - [‍Grim Fate]
Skeletal Marauder - [‍Gruesome Cleave]
Fast frontal cast.
Flesh Crafter - [‍Throw Cleaver]
This spell also does damage to enemies and should be aimed at any enemy to deal extra damage.
Help with this by positioning the mobs in front of the Flesh Crafter.
Help with this by positioning the mobs in front of the Flesh Crafter.
Loyal Creation - [‍Spine Crush]
A big circle cast that can't be disrupted as it recasts until the cast is finished once.
Fast frontal cast.
This spell also does damage to enemies and should be aimed at any enemy to deal extra damage.
Help with this by positioning the mobs in front of the Flesh Crafter.
A big circle cast that can't be disrupted as it recasts until the cast is finished once.
[‍On the Hook]
The boss is fixating on players and is not tankable. You are responsible for the adds.
Every 25% boss HP he calls in 1 Irontide Cleaver and 1 Irontide Powdershot
Irontide Cleaver
[‍Heavy Slash]
Aim this frontal away from any team member and any [‍Heavy Ordnance].
Aim this frontal away from any team member and any [‍Heavy Ordnance].
Irontide Powdershot
Is standing still most of the time casting [‍Molten Slug]
Drag the Irontide Cleaver close and focus the Irontide Powdershot down.
[‍Mass Bombardment]
Applies [‍Sighted Artillery], move with your melee team.
[‍Fiery Ricochet]
Avoid stacking up on this mechanic.
[‍Clear the Deck]
This is a very fast frontal so aim it away from any players.
[‍Withdraw] - Be ready to pick up the following adds:
Ashvane Deckhand
[‍Crimson Swipe]
Another fast frontal to aim away.
Another fast frontal to aim away.
Ashvane Cannoneer
[‍Broadside]
Long cast frontal that should be aimed away from the group.
[‍Unstable Ordnance]
Pick this up and use the ExtraActionButton to shoot the boss down.
Long cast frontal that should be aimed away from the group.
Pick this up and use the ExtraActionButton to shoot the boss down.
[‍Crimson Swipe]
Another fast frontal to aim away.
[‍Broadside]
[‍Unstable Ordnance]
Long cast frontal that should be aimed away from the group.
Pick this up and use the ExtraActionButton to shoot the boss down.
[‍Crashing Tide]
A frontal that needs to be aimed away from the group whenever possible.
[‍Break Water]
Bait the water pools away from the statue in the middle.
[‍Tidal Surge]
Summons 2 waves that need to be dodged back to back. Be ready to move the boss to a safe spot and aim [‍Crashing Tide] away from the group when it is about to be cast as this can be a deadly overlap.
[‍Putrid Waters]
Remove this debuff with [‍Divine Shield]. Furthermore, you can help mitigate the damage the person who doesnt get dispelled recieves with [‍Blessing of Spellwarding].
Demolishing Terror
[‍Hull Cracker]
Don't leave melee of the Demolishing Terror.
Don't leave melee of the Demolishing Terror.
[‍Slam]
This knocks you back. Walk back to the Demolishing Terror afterwards.
This knocks you back. Walk back to the Demolishing Terror afterwards.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
Ashvane Commander - [‍Bolstering Shout]
Bilge Rat Tempest - [‍Choking Waters]
Bilge Rat Pillager - [‍Stinky Vomit]
Pay extra attention to these casts:
Scrimshaw Enforcer - [‍Slobber Knocker]
Casted frontal cone that is hard to see.
Irontide Raider - [‍Iron Hook] into [‍Savage Tempest]
Blacktar Bomber - [‍Fire Bomb]
Ashvane Commander - [‍Azerite Charge]
Irontide Powdershot - [‍Molten Slug]
Ashvane Spotter - [‍Sighted Artillery]
Bilge Rat Demolisher - [‍Crushing Slam]
Casted frontal cone that is hard to see.
[‍Skullsplitter]
Deals 2 instances of physical damage over 2 seconds, while also applying a bleed to you.
Remove the bleed with [‍Divine Shield] or [‍Blessing of Protection] or even [‍Stoneform].
[‍Commanding Roar]
Summons [‍Shadow Breath] so be sure to position the boss in the safe lane.
[‍Forge Weapon] - Summons one of the following 3 weapons:
[‍Molten Mace]
Kite the boss during this duration, don't tank him.

Always dispel [‍Web Wrap] targets instantly.
General TipsGeneral TipsPersonal/External
Rotate through [‍Astral Shift], [‍Stone Bulwark Totem] and [‍Earth Elemental] to survive both [‍Alerting Shrill] and [‍Gossamer Onslaught].
[‍Nature's Guardian] will proc every [‍Gossamer Onslaught] so don't use your strong defensives for this ability.
General TipsGeneral TipsOutput CdsPersonal/External
Always stay close to the boss as it otherwise becomes harder to dodge [‍Impale] the further away you are.
General TipsGeneral TipsOutput CdsPersonal/External
Rotate through your healing arsenal to heal through the damage done by [‍Infestation].
General TipsGeneral TipsOutput CdsPersonal/External
Fill holes in your healing cooldowns by using defensives and communicate that to your group.
General TipsGeneral TipsPersonal/External
When you are affected by [‍Grasping Blood] you can use any form of crowd control to free yourself, such as [‍Thunderstorm].
General TipsGeneral TipsPersonal/External
Rotate through [‍Astral Shift] and [‍Stone Bulwark Totem] when you are affected by [‍Cultivated Poisons], and ensure to face correctly to not hit your party once the debuff is removed.

General TipsGeneral TipsOutput CdsPersonal/External
Ensure to rotate through your healing cooldowns for each [‍Vociferous Indoctrination].

On higher keys, always use a defensive when you tank [‍Shadows of Doubt] for its full duration.
If you don't plan on tanking [‍Shadows of Doubt] then use your defensives for [‍Vociferous Indoctrination].

General TipsGeneral TipsPersonal/External
Stay stacked with your group to maximize [‍Healing Rain] and [‍Deluge] uptime , as this fight has a high HPS requirement.
General TipsGeneral TipsPersonal/External

[‍Ancestral Vigor] is important to help your party survive the initial damage, make sure to apply this to everyone in your party except your tank.

Having a pre-placed [‍Demonic Circle] on the opposite side of the room can be life saving for this overlap.

Interrupt [‍Spirit Bolt] every time a non-tank player is targeted. Because you can interrupt with your pet while crowd-controlled, you should hold your [‍Axe Toss] for whenever everybody is affected by [‍Repulsive Visage].

Make sure that there are no [‍Tears of the Forest] behind you when [‍Repulsive Visage] is about to happen as you might get feared through them.
Try to line up your cooldowns with Droman Oulfarran's [‍Droman's Wrath] to gain a huge DPS boost. This happens when Droman Oulfarran reaches 20% health.

Use your defensives during the [‍Guessing Game].
[‍Demonic Gateway] and [‍Demonic Circle] help you and your group break [‍Mind Link] quickly.
Use pet attack on the Glooming Larvas that spawn from [‍Accelerated Incubation] when they are close to melee to ensure that they are getting cleaved.

[‍Demonic Circle] helps you kiting the boss into Bombs.
Focus down the Ashvane Cannoneer during the phase change to quickly use [‍Unstable Ordnance] to get the boss down from the ship.
If you can't find a safe spot for [‍Tidal Surge] you can also use [‍Demonic Circle] to jump over the waves.
In general try baiting [‍Break Water] away from the safe spots.
Use your Imp's [‍Singe Magic] to help your healer dispel [‍Putrid Waters] during the fight.
[‍Havoc] helps you cleave down Demolishing and Gripping Terrors at the same time.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
[‍Brackish Bolt] from Irontide Waveshaper.
[‍Watertight Shell] from Irontide Waveshaper.
[‍Water Bolt] from Bilge Rat Tempest.
[‍Choking Waters] from Bilge Rat Tempest.
[‍Bolstering Shout] from Ashvane Commander.
Always use [‍Summon Infernal] if you're talented into [‍Crashing Chaos] since that buff stays after the dungeon starts.

Use [[‍Fel Domination]] shortly before starting the dungeon. Starting a dungeon despawns your pet, and this enables you to rapidly summon your pet without spending a [‍Soul Shard] while still having ‍Fel Domination off cooldown in case your pet dies later.

Cast [‍Rain of Fire] to start an early [‍Diabolic Ritual] cycle. You can also pre-cycle through [‍Diabolic Ritual: Overlord] and [‍Diabolic Ritual: Mother of Chaos] to have [‍Diabolic Ritual: Pit Lord] up for the first pack of enemies that you engage.
[‍Demonic Circle] and [‍Burning Rush] help you dodge [‍Shadowflame Breath] from [‍Commanding Roar].
Use [‍Dark Pact] before [‍Commanding Roar].
Use [‍Dark Pact] during [‍Blistering Heat].
Bait [‍Fiery Cleave] towards a wall to make it easier to dodge.
Use [‍Dark Pact] before [‍Twilight Buffet].
Use [‍Curse of Exhaustion] to slow down the Invoked Shadowflame Spirits.
Use defensives during [‍Abyssal Corruption] and [‍Void Surge].
You can use Mutated Hatchlings as a funnel for more boss damage!
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
[‍Earth Bolt] from Twilight Earthcaller.
[‍Mass Tremor] from Twilight Earthcaller.
[‍Shadowflame Bolt] from Twilight Beguiler.
[‍Sear Mind] from Twilight Beguiler.
Always use [‍Summon Infernal] if you're talented into [‍Crashing Chaos] since that buff stays after the dungeon starts.

Use [[‍Fel Domination]] shortly before starting the dungeon. Starting a dungeon despawns your pet, and this enables you to rapidly summon your pet without spending a [‍Soul Shard] while still having ‍Fel Domination off cooldown in case your pet dies later.

Cast [‍Rain of Fire] to start an early [‍Diabolic Ritual] cycle. You can also pre-cycle through [‍Diabolic Ritual: Overlord] and [‍Diabolic Ritual: Mother of Chaos] to have [‍Diabolic Ritual: Pit Lord] up for the first pack of enemies that you engage.
Both of Avanoxx abilities [‍Alerting Shrill] and [‍Gossamer Onslaught] have 40 seconds cooldown.
[‍Alerting Shrill] is physical damage, go in [‍Defensive Stance] or use [‍Die by the Sword] if needed.
Use [‍Spell Reflection] to reduce damage taken from [‍Gossamer Onslaught].
If you are fixated by Starved Crwaler try to not kite them into melee, since Avanoxx can eat them and get a damage buff through [‍Insatiable].
Use at least [‍Spell Reflection] when affected by [‍Infestation], and remember you place a [‍Ceaseless Swarm] pool when it expires.
Kill Bloodstained Webmages fast and interrupt [‍Silken Restraints].

[‍Cultivated Poisons] come just slightly too frequently to use [[‍Spell Reflection]] for all of them. When you can't use ‍Spell Reflection use [‍Die by the Sword] instead, like shown in the timeline below.
When you're affected by [‍Grasping Blood] you can use any form of crowd control such as [‍Shockwave] or [‍Storm Bolt] instead of killing it to cancel your root.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
[‍Resonant Barrage] from Trilling Attendant.
[‍Horrifying Shrill] from Ixin.
[‍Revolting Volley] from Bloodstained Webmage.
[‍Venom Volley] from Blood Overseer.
Pay extra attention to these casts:
[‍Alarm Shrill] from Sentry Stagshell
A really long cast that needs to get disrupted.
[‍Massive Slam] from Nerubian Hauler and Hulking Bloodguard
A short stun that ramps in damage done per cast.
A really long cast that needs to get disrupted.
A short stun that ramps in damage done per cast.
Use your [‍Spell Reflection] during [‍Vociferous Indoctrination], you have it ready for every cast.
[‍Vociferous Indoctrination] spawns a pool, so make sure to stand on and follow the tank as the cast finishes.
Watch out for [‍Knife Throw]. Use defensives if you're targeted by this ability.
Help soak the [‍Freezing Blood] from the tank.
Use your at least [‍Spell Reflection] for [‍Dark Pulse]. This happens at 100 boss energy, first is 1 minute into the fight and then 1 minute and 18 seconds apart.

Use your [[[[‍Spell Reflection]]]] for [[[‍Splice]]].  The cooldown of  ‍Spell Reflection is just barely too long to cleanly get it for all, but you can get most of  ‍Splice covered if you instantly use ‍Spell Reflection as soon as ‍Splice is applied or cooldown of ‍Spell Reflection is up.
Save AoE cooldowns for [‍Umbral Weave], you can get some difficult overlaps with [‍Shifting Anomalies] relocating. You can remove the root with [‍Avatar].
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
[‍Web Bolt] from Sureki Silkbinder.
[‍Grimweave Blast] from Covert Webmancer.
[‍Mending Web] from Covert Webmancer.
[‍Twist Thoughts] from Herald of Anurek.
[‍Void Wave] from Sureki Unnaturaler.
Try to spawn [‍Volatile Spikes] close together or in a line, so you can detonate them all with 1 [‍Refracting Beam].
Alternate [‍Spell Reflection], [‍Die by the Sword] and [‍Defensive Stance] for [‍Earth Shatterer] or [‍Refracting Beam] when you are breaking many [‍Volatile Spike].

Control your damage on Crystal Shards so that you don't get several stacks of [[‍Crystalline Eruption]], but still kill them quickly. Aim to always have 1 stack of ‍Crystalline Eruption ticking on you, since if you take too long time [‍Fortified Shell] consumes the Crystal Shards and still damage you but also increase the potency of Sharmoraks absorb shield.
Use your defensives when you have multiple stacks of  [‍Unstable Energy].
Make sure to interrupt [‍Molten Metal] from Speaker Brokk.
Use your defensives for [‍Exhaust Vents] and [‍Blazing Crescendo].
Balance your damage to defeat Speaker Brokk and Speaker Dorlita at the same time, whoever survives after the other is defeated starts doing a lot of damage with [‍Silenced Speaker].

Save [[‍Die by the Sword]] for in case something goes bad with [‍Void Corruption] and you have to hold the debuff for a while, or use ‍Die by the Sword if you are low health with [‍Entropic Reckoning] going out.

[‍Howling Fear] from Ghastly Voidsoul.
[‍Censoring Gear] from Turned Speaker.
[‍Piercing Wail] from Void Bound Howler.
[‍Restoring Metals] from Forgebound Mender and Cursedforge Mender.
[‍Arcing Void] from Cursedheart Invader.
Use [‍Spell Reflection] during [‍Obsidian Beam], it should be ready for all of them.
There is a bad overlap with the 4th [‍Dark Orb] exploding and the 3rd [‍Shadowy Decay], save [‍Die by the Sword] for this overlap.
Use [‍Spell Reflection], and [‍Defensive Stance] if needed, for [‍Shadowy Decay].
[‍Dark Orb] deals more damage depending on its distance to you, so be ready to go into [‍Defensive Stance] if needed.
Use [‍Heroic Leap] to quickly deliver [‍Arathi Bombs].
Use [‍Spell Reflection] when Rasha'nan casts [‍Erosive Spray], the DoT it applies [‍Lingering Erosion] does a lot of damage.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
[‍Night Bolt] from Nightfall Shadowmage.
[‍Ensnaring Shadows] from Nightfall Shadowmage.
[‍Tormenting Beam] from Nightfall Darkcaster.
[‍Umbral Barrier] from Nightfall Darkcaster.
Interrupt [‍Spirit Bolt] every time a non-tank player is targeted, unless it is on you then let it go through and use [‍Spell Reflection].
Use [‍Berserker Rage] to immune [‍Repulsive Visage].
Try to line up your cooldowns with Droman Oulfarran's [‍Droman's Wrath] to gain a huge DPS boost. This happens when Droman Oulfarran reaches 20% health.
Use [‍Storm Bolt] as backup CC if needed to control the Illusionary Vulpins. It is better to get longer duration crowd-control from other classes.
Use your defensives during the [‍Guessing Game].
Use [‍Heroic Leap] if needed to break [[‍Mind Link]] quickly. The main target of ‍Mind Link is always the tank, so ideally preposition yourself on the other side of the boss.
Use [‍Spell Reflection] and [‍Die by the Sword] during [‍Consumption].

Use at least [‍Spell Reflection] as a defensive if you're targeted by [‍Heaving Retch].
Use [‍Shockwave] on Carrion Worms.

If any adds are still alive during [‍Final Harvest], use [‍Storm Bolt] or [‍Shockwave] to crowd-control them. With them crowd-controlled, the boss doesn't cast [‍Tortured Echoes] even though an add is alive.
Aim [[‍Meat Hooks]] towards Surgeon Stitchflesh, and pay attention to when Surgeon Stitchflesh [‍Escape] to the platform to bring him back instantly with ‍Meat Hooks.

Control your damage to Stitchflesh's Creation so that it stays alive for the [‍Escape] into [‍Meat Hooks] to bring back Surgeon Stitchflesh instantly, but that it does not live much longer than that. The main damage you take in this fight comes from [‍Festering Rot] with damage that is ramping up while Stitchflesh's Creation lives.
Use a defensive if targeted by [‍Stitchneedle] when low health.
You can use [‍Die by the Sword] for [‍Morbid Fixation] if it is not getting interrupted by [‍Meat Hooks].
